target.name: Chapter
target.text: Getting Started

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Setting Up Your Buddy List

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Sign in with your username and password.

target.name: Step
target.text: Sign in with your username and password.

target.name: Step
target.text: Locate the Teaming Buddy List portlet (unlike this picture, your portlet probably contains no names yet other than your own):

target.name: Step
target.text: In the portlet, click Add buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the first few letters of either the first or last name of a buddy, and then click that person's linked name in the drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat Step 4 as often as necessary to add all of your buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Tips for Using Buddy Lists

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Modifying Your Personal Workspace

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Adding Basic Information

target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the portal page, click My workspace in the navigator portlet:

target.name: Step
target.text: On the portal page, click My workspace in the navigator portlet:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Manage > Modify this workspace, located toward the upper right corner of the page:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Figure
target.text: The Modified Personal-Workspace Page

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Editing Contact Information and Add Pictures

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Modify profile:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Modify profile:

target.name: Step
target.text: Alter any contact information that is missing or incorrect.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Browse button to upload a picture:

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat Step 3 until you upload all the pictures you want into your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Next to the filenames of uploaded pictures, click the up-arrow or down-arrow to position the picture where you want it in the list:

target.name: Step
target.text: When you are finished, click OK to submit the form.

target.name: Figure
target.text: Primary Picture and Thumbnail Pictures

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Tips for Uploading Images

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add a Blog Entry

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View your personal workspace page.

target.name: Step
target.text: View your personal workspace page.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Workspace section of the tools sidebar, click the title of your blog folder (Blog, by default):

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New: Blog entry:

target.name: Step
target.text: Provide a title, and type your journal entry in the Description section of the form.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you choose, you can click Browse to upload a picture or supporting document in the Attachments section of the form.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Figure
target.text: Completed Blog Entry

target.name: Figure
target.text: Content of the Completed Blog Entry

target.name: Figure
target.text: The View Comments Link at the Bottom of the Blog Entry

target.name: Figure
target.text: Displayed Comments for a Blog Entry

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Tips for Writing Blog Entries

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Collaborate with Others

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Commenting on a Blog Entry

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Sign in and view the portal page.

target.name: Step
target.text: Sign in and view the portal page.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Find people text box, type a few letters of a teammate's first or last name, and click the linked name of the person whose blog you want to view:

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Workspace section of the tools sidebar, click the title of the person's blog (Blog, by default):

target.name: Step
target.text: At the bottom of a blog entry, click the Add comment link:

target.name: Step
target.text: Provide text for your comment:

target.name: Step
target.text: Toward the bottom of the comment form, click OK.

target.name: Figure
target.text: A Comment Added to a Blog Entry

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Collaborating in a Folder

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click the My workspace icon in the Navigator tools to view your personal workspace:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the My workspace icon in the Navigator tools to view your personal workspace:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Manage > Add new folder:

target.name: Step
target.text: Provide a title for your folder and select a type of folder (our example uses Discussion).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the link for your newly created folder.

target.name: Step
target.text: (Optional) Add new entries.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the management menu bar, click Team > Add or delete team members:

target.name: Step
target.text: Type a few letters of either the first or last names of teammates, and click their linked names:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Figure
target.text: An Entry Added to Your Folder by a Teammate

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Creating a Team Workspace

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Create the Workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the portal page, in the workspace tree, click Team workspaces:

target.name: Step
target.text: On the portal page, in the workspace tree, click Team workspaces:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add a team workspace button, located just under the workspace tree toward the top of the page:

target.name: Step
target.text: Provide a title for your team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Team members section, use the type-to-find feature (typing a few letters as Novell Teaming supplies a list of links that match what you have typed so far) to specify your teammates.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Workspace folders section, select the check box next to the folders you want your team workspace to contain. (You can also add sub-workspaces and more folders later.)

target.name: Step
target.text: (Optional) In the Announcement section of the form, click the checkbox and provide a message in the Announcement text box. Novell Teaming automatically sends the announcement text in an e-mail message to your teammates after you submit this form.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Tips for Team Workspaces

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Viewing Team Members

target.name: Figure
target.text: Collapsing the Team Members Accessory Panel

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View your team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: View your team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Team > Show team membership.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Communicating with Teammates

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click the Team menu on the management menu bar.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Team menu on the management menu bar.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click either Create a meeting with the team or Send mail to the team.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Allowing Visitors to Your Team Workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Sign in as the owner of the team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Sign in as the owner of the team workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Navigate to your team-workspace page.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Manage > Access control:

target.name: Step
target.text: In the This folder... section, if it is not set to No already, click the no radio button, and click Apply:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add a role > Visitor:

target.name: Step
target.text: Toward the bottom-left portion of the form, click Add a user, and use the type-to-find feature to select a name:

target.name: Step
target.text: In that new user's row, select the check box in the Visitor column:

target.name: Step
target.text: Repeat Step 6 and Step 7 until you have added all your visitors.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Save changes.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Using Advanced Search to Explore

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From either the navigator portlet or the navigator section of the tools sidebar, among the search tools, click Advanced:

target.name: Step
target.text: From either the navigator portlet or the navigator section of the tools sidebar, among the search tools, click Advanced:

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the text that you are looking for (for example, css), and select the check box of one or more workspaces or folders to restrict the search:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Search.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Using the Workspace Tree to Explore

target.name: Figure
target.text: Using the Global Workspaces Tree
